subject: Football (College)
Coaches and Managers
College Football Playoff National Championship
Religion and Belief
lead_paragraph: Clemson Coach Dabo Swinney has been accused of creating a culture on his team that goes too far in promoting Christianity, but he says his job is to win football games.
snippet: Clemson Coach Dabo Swinney has been accused of creating a culture on his team that goes too far in promoting Christianity, but he says his job is to win football games.
